Using toy data as user did not provide data:

```{r}
data(linnerud)
X <- linnerud$exercise
Y <- linnerud$physiological[,1]
```

```{r}
comet.pls <- pls(X,Y,ncomp=3, mode='regression',scale = FALSE)

comet.pls.val <- perf(comet.pls, validation='Mfold',folds =7, nrepeat =200, progressBar = T)
```


```{r}
comet.pls.val$RSS
```
